page.title: 14CANDY TILES (2) HEATHFIELD
page.content: They do some different sizes 8"x6",6"x6",6"x4"and 4 and a half " x 4 and a half".They are put on a conveyor belt and that goes along through the dryer to the kiln car. They are moved very carefully because{ {green tiles}(as they are called) crack easily.The time that it takes to go through the{dryer}and {kiln}takes five and a half days .They are then put back on the conveyor belt ready to be{ {glost fired.}They put the patterns on by hand because if they don't get all the air out from underneath, the pattern will spoil in the{transfer {kiln.}90% of the tiles are sold in home markets.
